title: Awakening
description: After Calla's mother dies in a freak accident, she has to spend the summer with a grandmother she barely knows. There's something different about her grandmother and her town of Lily Dale is just as strange. Before long, Calla discovers that not only is her grandmother a psychic, but the entire town is a psychic community. Maybe this explains some of the strange experiences Calla has had herself. But can her psychic ability help her to find out what really happened to her mother?
author: Wendy Corsi Staub
